Module: video_to_html5_webm

Converts audio or video file into a HTML5 video webm.
uses code from this issue/question from fluent-ffmepg
to understand the ffmpeg used to encode webm video see this guide

Author:
  • Pietro Passarelli
Source:
  • interactive_transcription_generator/video_to_html5_webm/index.js, line 1
Examples

Example usage

  convert_video({
    src: "path/to/vide_file.mov",
    outputName: "path/to/webm_file.webm",
    ffmpegBin: "path/to/bin/ffmpge",
    callback: function(resp){
      // do something with output, path to webm video
    }
  });

Example of object retunred video webm html5 

  {
    videoOgg: "path/to/video/webmFile.webm",
    processedVideo: true 
  }

Requires

  • module:fluent-ffmpeg
  • module:an

Methods

(inner) convert(config) → {callback}

Takes in a config object with propreties: src, outputName, ffmpegBin and optional callback.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
config object

The parameter containting attribute options.

Properties
Name Type Description
src string

full path of video or audio to convert.
outputName string

full path of video file name, needs to have .webm extension.
ffmpegBin string

Path to the ffmpeg binary. Optional, if no provided it will try to use system one if present.
Source:
  • interactive_transcription_generator/video_to_html5_webm/index.js, line 29
Returns:

config.callback - Optional callback to return when video done processing. It returns the converted webm path name. Same as config.outputName input.

Type
callback
